title: AGG_COUNT_DISTINCT
description: Performs a dynamic aggregation on a specified Salesforce object and returns the count of unique (distinct) values in a selected field for the matching records.

parameters.name: aggregate_object_name
parameters.description: The name of the object containing records to evaluate.

parameters.name: aggregate_field_name
parameters.description: The name of the field whose distinct values will be counted.

parameters.name: … group_field_name
parameters.description: The name of the field used to filter records.

parameters.name: … group_field_value
parameters.description: The field value used as filtering criteria.

examples:
AGG_COUNT_DISTINCT(
		"Opportunity", 
		"Type", 
		"AccountId", Id, 
		"StageName = 'Closed Won'"
)
-- Calculates the count of distinct non-null Type values from Opportunity records, grouped by AccountId, where StageName is "Closed Won" and AccountId matches Account data. 

-- During runtime, DSP generates the following SOQL query:
SELECT AccountId groupField0, COUNT_DISTINCT(Type) agg0 
FROM Opportunity 
WHERE AccountId IN ('0018K00000kPuYXQA0', '0018K00000kPuYYQA0', '0018K00000kPuYZQA0', '0018K00000kPuYaQAK', '0018K00000kPuYbQAK') AND StageName = 'Closed Won' 
GROUP BY AccountId

AGG_COUNT_DISTINCT(
		"Opportunity", 
		"Type", 
		"AccountId", Id, 
		"OwnerId", OwnerId, 
		"StageName = 'Closed Won'"
)
-- Calculates the count of distinct non-null Type values from Opportunity records, grouped by AccountId and OwnerId, filtering for records where StageName is 'Closed Won'.

-- During runtime, DSP generates the following SOQL query:
SELECT AccountId groupField0, OwnerId groupField1, COUNT_DISTINCT(Type) agg0 
FROM Opportunity 
WHERE (AccountId IN ('0018K00000kPuYXQA0', '0018K00000kPuYYQA0', '0018K00000kPuYZQA0', '0018K00000kPuYaQAK', '0018K00000kPuYbQAK') AND OwnerId IN ('005D2000006JY2bIAG', '0058K0000047WdvQAE', '0055e000007rpICAAY')) AND StageName = 'Closed Won'
GROUP BY AccountId, OwnerId
